name: Anneysen Bilisim Teknolojileri Reklam Yayincilik ve Iletisim Hizmetleri
tag_list: social-network, turkish, turkey, moms, mom-to-bes, expert-advice
overview:
www.anneysen.com is an online vertical social network for moms and mom-to-beâ€™s.

It was founded in January 2010 by two entrepreneur moms in the prosperous and booming Turkish internet market. By incorporating free-of-charge expert advice, mom-blogs, polls and etc the site is a rising start-up with an escalating member base, currently 41.000 big, which makes the site the biggest online mom community in Turkey.

www.anneysen.com, mainly focuses on Turkish speaking, Internet user moms and mom-to-beâ€™s, which is estimated to be 4 million in size.

The site aims to serve in three fronts: being the ultimate parental information hub, facilitating sharing and fun among moms, and creating a sense of community. Business model mainly relies on advertising.
